wxIFMCreateFloatingWindowEvent Class Reference

Inherits wxIFMPluginEvent.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Used to create a window to float a component.

This event is resonsible for creating a window to float the component in, createing the root component of that floating window, and docking the component into the root component of the window. It should not do anything else.

See also:
wxIFMDestroyFloatingWindowEvent
